contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{For|the Peruvian guerrilla organization|Shining Path}} {{Orphan|date=September 2008}} '''El Sendero Luminoso''' is also the name of a rock climb at El Potrero Chico, [[Nuevo León]], [[Mexico]]. A bigwall sport-route, El Sendero Luminoso rises over 1500 ft up the impressive front side of El Toro. It is one of the harder long routes in the area—11 of its 15 pitches clock in at 5.12. The route was established by Jeff Jackson, Kurt Smith and Pete Peacock and is graded 5.12+ V (15 pitches). {{Coord missing|Nuevo León}} [[Category:Geography of Mexico]] {{NuevoLeón-geo-stub}}
